General.Name: Sinopower Semiconductor
General.Description: Sinopower Semiconductor, Inc. operates as a fabless IC design company in Taiwan. The company researches, designs, manufactures, markets, and sells power discrete devices, including MOSFET and IGBT, as well as its modules; and high voltage power ICs. The company's products are used in various applications, such as computers comprising PCs and servers, as well as power suppliers, communication equipment, handheld devices, consumer products, industrials, etc. Sinopower Semiconductor, Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
